snippet: ZARITSKY--Avrom. Former producer NBC News. Survived by wife, Joyce (Ship) children, Joshua and Eve. Funeral Sunday, 11am, Edwards Dowdle, 64 Ashford, Dobbs Ferry, NY. Donations to Michael J. Fox Foundation Parkinson's Research. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZARITSKY--Avrom. Former producer NBC News. Survived by wife, Joyce (Ship) children, Joshua and Eve. Funeral Sunday, 11am, Edwards Dowdle, 64 Ashford, Dobbs Ferry, NY. Donations to Michael J. Fox Foundation Parkinson's Research. 1/3
